p: Human leukaemic cell line THP-1 cells were cultured in Dulbecco’s Modified Eagle Medium (DMEM) supplemented with 10% ( v/ v) foetal bovine serum, 1% ( v/ v) nonessential amino acids, 100U/mL penicillin, and 100 μg/mL streptomycin, according to [ 24]. They were incubated at 37 °C in a humidified 5% CO 2 atmosphere.
